QuestData.Title: No Peace In Death
QuestData.Description:
$n. I have a favor to ask, if I may.
This realm... The sense of honor and purpose that guides its denizens calls to me.
My life was defined by such values. Maldraxxus, for a time, shared them with me... But I returned from the Maw to a land rife with treachery.
I'd like to speak with the Paragon about Bastion.
QuestData.LogDescription: Talk to the Paragon of Courage with Alexandros.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Xandria at Agthia's Repose.
QuestData.RewardText: Come. There is much to show you.

Objectives.Objective: Walk with Xandria to Agthia's Repose
